Enumeration.description: Raw Data View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Raw Data View displays raw packet data in two contiguous streams (input and output). It provides flexible visual and layout customization and supports protocol-governed filtering and changing of root protocol.

Enumeration.description: Structure View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Structure View decodes all packet data using the protocol definitions stored in the product or provided by the user. Supports filtering and changing of root protocol.

Enumeration.description: Statistics visualizer title and description

Item.text: Statistics collects and displays statistics and device throughput. Several statistic values are calculated and displayed on the linear graph.

Enumeration.description: Packet View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Packet View displays each monitored data packet on separate row and provides individual packet decoding, according to different formats and protocols.

Enumeration.description: Data View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Data View data visualizer displays data in two separate windows. First window shows the data received from the device while the second window shows data sent to the device.

Enumeration.description: Request View (Legacy) visualizer title and description

Item.text: Request View data visualizer decodes all data packets and control requests sent to and received from the serial device. This is a legacy data converter.

Enumeration.description: Request View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Request View decodes all data packets and control requests sent to and received from the serial device.

Enumeration.description: URB View visualizer title and description

Item.text: URB View data visualizer decodes raw packets and control requests sent to and received from the usb device.

Enumeration.description: Console View (Legacy) visualizer title and description

Item.text: Console View works as a serial console window and displays characters received from the serial device. It is a useful visualizer to monitor text-based protocols. This is a legacy data visualizer.

Enumeration.description: Console View visualizer title and description

Item.text: Console View works as a serial console window and displays characters received from the serial device. It is a useful visualizer to monitor text-based protocols.

Enumeration.description: Request View visualizer schemes (coloring and fonts)

Enumeration.description: New Video View Converter

Item.text: Video View data visualizer parses packets and configuration descriptors for USB Video compliant device.

Enumeration.description: New Audio Converter

Item.text: USB Audio View visualizer parses packets and configuration descriptors for USB Audio (version 2.0) compliant device.

Enumeration.description: New Still Image View

Item.text: Still Image/MTP View data visualizer decodes USB Still Image/MTP protocol for devices belonging to the Still Image/MTP class.

Enumeration.description: New Mass Storage View

Item.text: Mass Storage View data visualizer decodes USB Mass Storage protocol for devices belonging to the Mass Storage class

Enumeration.description: New USB Communications Converter

Item.text: Communications View data visualizer decodes USB Communications Class packets and descriptors.

Console View visualizer options

Enumeration.description: Advanced Console View data visualizer title and description

Item.text: Advanced Console View works as a serial console window and displays characters received from the serial device. It is a useful visualizer to monitor text-based protocols.

Enumeration.description: HTTP View

Item.text: HTTP View data visualizer parses and displays HTTP protocol requests and responses.

Enumeration.description: HTTP View visualizer schemes (colors and fonts)
New MODBUS View data visualizer title and description

Item.text: MODBUS View decodes all data packets sent to and received from the serial device using MODBUS protocol.

Enumeration.description: Statistics: Packets Total/sec counter (name, units, description)

Item.text: Packets Total/Sec is the rate packets are transferred to or from the device during write or read operations.

Enumeration.description: Statistics: Bytes Total/sec counter (name, units, description)

Item.text: Bytes Total/Sec is the rate bytes are transferred to or from the device during write or read operations.

Enumeration.description: Statistics: Bytes Read/sec counter (name, units, description)

Item.text: Bytes Read/Sec is the rate at which bytes are transferred from the device during read operations.

Enumeration.description: Statistics: Bytes Written/sec counter (name, units, description)

Item.text: Bytes Written/Sec is the rate at which bytes are transferred to the device during write operations.
